title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1705.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1705.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part: (a) Body imaging scanning equipment shall mean equipment that utilizes a
low dose of ionizing radiation to produce an anatomical image capable of detecting objects placed on, attached to, or secreted within a person's body. (b) Employee
shall mean any individual employed by the department, outside agency, volunteer or service
provider. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

1705.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 13, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 50, eff. 12/13/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
